channel.title: [Quick Help?] How to change icon in skill menu and chatbox?
channel.description:
Hello! Can anyone please tell me how can i change, for example, [u]Agility icon in skills menu to any other, using custom sprite[/u]? Maybe not to change, just to put any other icon on it... Well, basically I just need to repalce agility with another skill...
[b]This one:[/b] [img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8016/agilityx.png[/img]
[b]And also that one in chatbox, that appears on level up:[/b](ignore the hp icon, was too lazy to go to agility) [img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/204/agilchatbar.png[/img]
Where can i change these? Maybe you can tell me [b]where should i look for it?[/b] Also a tutorial link, how to insert custom sprite and place it somewhere, would be nice.
Also, [b]can I just open cache some how and replace aglity icon with the new one i want?[/b] If that, what cache editor should I use?
P.S. I have a Project-Insanity base.

item.title: [Quick Help?] How to change icon in skill menu and chatbox?
item.dc:creator: @Eyfia Eyfia
item.description:
@Eyfia wrote:

pasta186:

probably toms cache suite thing would be best,i used it yesterday but i forgot the tutorial i looked at it.try looking in your sprites folder too,maybe some are in there?best of luck.

Didn’t find any in sprites folder. Umm so I can do this with Tom’s Cache Suite? Can you tell me dl link or anything?

EDIT: Found a dl link, now i’m editing the cache. When i put a new icon it doesn’t appear in game! Anyone? Perhaps better would be if it reads from the custom sprite folder…

Read full topic
item.source: [Quick Help?] How to change icon in skill menu and chatbox?
